channel.title: Ok I really need help FAST
channel.description:
OK THIS IS MAKING ME MAD..... I just recently got my computer reformated... So now i trying to run my server and it don't work none of my runservers work any more Not my client or my server so if anyone could help TYVM I need help quick because Im about to release this so other people can play.
I dont understand these codes do i need MYSQL? If so please give me the link for the right version to download!!!!! Ok here's the codes..
[code]@ECHO OFF TITLE SluggerScape JAVA -Xmx500m EGUI PAUSE[/code]
ABOVE IS THE CLIENT RUN CODE
[code]@echo off title SluggerScape java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server pause[/code]
ABOVE IS THE SERVER RUN CODE
Anyone see whats wrong? none of em work what i get with the is an error with java like its not an internal or external command IM GETTING MAD.
Thank you if you help i appreciate it!
( for some reason the runserver for my server only works with compiler i got now)
DO I NEED MYSQL OR SOMETHING? PLEASE GIVE LINK IF I DO!!!

That’s alright. Have fun
